name: Lobon and The Great Donut
description:
Lobon and The Great Donut is a platformer game where you guide Lobon, a cute green critter, through various lands on a quest for The Great Donut, said to be the most delicious donut to ever exist. His journey won't be easy however as he will encounter various nasties and hazards determined to put a stop to him.

Can you make it through 11 challenging levels?

Created for the Let's Talk Game Design Let's Talk Game Jam 2022.
